text: The 1892 Colgate football team represented Colgate University in the 1892 college football season. The team captain for the 1892 season was Preston Smith.http://gocolgateraiders.com.s3.amazonaws.com/documents/2012/11/28/Year- by-Year_Results.pdf?id=2765 ==Schedule== 1892 Colgate Game-by-Game Records, College Football Data Warehouse, retrieved January 5, 2017. ==References== Colgate Category:Colgate Raiders football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Colgate football
